thread.title: Appalling from the minute I walked into reception
thread.title_full: Appalling from the minute I walked into reception - Review of Holiday Inn Express London City, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Michael H
title: Appalling from the minute I walked into reception
text: Lost my booking, then wanted credit card. When all was paid. Room poor, no lifts as"waiting for parts" one supposedly working but never moved from 5th floor, as builders using it. Breakfast has absolutely nothing for vegetarian except runny scrambled egg. No mushrooms tomato etc. Builders using power tools from 7:30. Had to prove I had paid - lucky I had print with me. Bathroom not cleaned...and all this happened last time I stayed here in summer 2016. That time was worse.... If alternative in area I would stay there
